message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our exclusive product, which holds immense value for us. Given its importance and the unique benefits it offers, we believe its true worth is $12,000. However, considering your potential needs and the alignment of our values, I am extending an offer to purchase this product from us at a special price of $10,000. This opportunity not only allows you to acquire a valuable asset but also supports our business growth. Please let me know if you are interested in discussing further details or proceeding with the purchase.
